messages.title: Election Communication
messages.content: Let's get Brexit done. Let's get on with the country's priorities. LET'S UNLEASH BRITAIN'S POTENTIAL.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Building high quality and genuinely affordable new homes, as well as tackling unfair increases in rent and service charges.
More police on the streets of Hackney, and longer sentences for criminals so that they can be properly rehabilitated.
More money for Homerton Hospital and other local NHS services, and a payrise for Hackney NHS staff.
Campaigning against rising rents and calling for a review of business rates to move the unfair tax burden away from shop owners.
Increased funding for schools to give every child in Hackney the best start in life.
Calling for an improved Vehicle Scrappage Scheme so that more people can afford to switch to electric/hybrid vehicles to improve air quality.

issues.economy: More funding for every pupil in every school. £3.6 billion to help towns invest and attract new businesses.
issues.education: Increased funding for schools to give every child in Hackney the best start in life.
issues.environment: Calling for an improved Vehicle Scrappage Scheme so that more people can afford to switch to electric/hybrid vehicles to improve air quality.
issues.health: More money for Homerton Hospital and other local NHS services, and a payrise for Hackney NHS staff.

housing.content: Building high quality and genuinely affordable new homes, as well as tackling unfair increases in rent and service charges.

images.caption: Planned NHS investments and police force expansion
